casebody.data:
No. 528

(October Term, 1929).

Broad River Power Co. et al. v. South Carolina ex rel. Daniel, Attorney General. Submitted June 11, 1930. Decided October 13, 1930. See 281 U. S. 537; also ante, p. 187. Messrs. Wm. Marshall Bullitt, C. Edward Paxson, George M. Le Pine, and W. C. McLain, for petitioners. Messrs. John M. Daniel, Cordie Page, and W. S. Nelson for respondent.

The petition for a rehearing is granted.
